channel.title: Development on Shahrukh Omar
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Shahrukh Omar

item.title: JS Extreme Minification: Binary Char Encoding - Part 1
item.description: In this part 2 of the “Extreme Minification” series I discuss in detail how I implemented the binary char encoding in JS and what were the main problems that needed to be solved.

item.title: JS Extreme Minification: Encoding Shapes - Part 1
item.description: One of the biggest challenges while doing my js1k challenge was rendering shapes. In part 1 of this series of posts I will discuss in detail the various possibilities and why I chose to go with binary char encoding.

item.title: Github Worktrees
item.description: Recently I needed another copy of the git repository I was working on but it seemed like an awful lot of work cloning it another folder and then switching back and forth and fetching/pushing to keep it all up-to-date.
